attributes.action: We the undersigned will not accept/acknowledge a petition for a 2nd EUreferendum
attributes.additional_details: The country has voted to put the GREAT back into GREAT Britain in the eyes of democracy. This cannot be undone and must be actioned immediately.
attributes.background: Ignore the ridiculous petition for a 2nd EU referendum by Remain campaigners and express an urgent interest in envoking ARTICLE 50 as soon as possible.
